translated: Que me conseillez-vous de faire ?

original: I didn't have the sense to do so.

original: He succeeded in entering the university.
translated: Il a réussi à entrer à l'université.

original: You should learn how to use your dictionary.

original: He dropped his wallet, and now it's mine.

original: I took for granted that he got homesick.

original: I told you I hated that shirt.
translated: Je vous ai dit que je détestais cette chemise.

original: Shall we play cowboy and Indians? I declare myself a sheriff, and you all must obey me.
translated: On joue au cowboy et aux Indiens ? Je me proclame shérif et vous devez tous m'obéir.

translated: Elle a obtenu qu'il fasse tout ce qu'elle voulait.

original: They all envied my new car.
translated: Ils étaient tous jaloux de ma nouvelle voiture.

original: Have you ever given money to a beggar?

original: What time do you expect me to be there?

original: How often do you play hockey?

translated: Celui qui a rendu un service doit se taire ; c'est à celui qui l'a reçu de parler.

original: It's my own fault.

original: Women commonly live longer than men.
translated: Les femmes vivent normalement plus longtemps que les hommes.

original: The place is certainly worth seeing.

original: I wish I were a stone.

original: The young girl lost her bracelet.

original: Have you ever been in love?

original: She's job hunting.

original: The love that I suffer from is a shameful disease.

original: That cat has beautiful fur.

original: The boat can still be seen.

original: He was checking you out.

original: The dog ran around the tree many times.

original: You need to be more careful.

original: I love Irish music.

translated: Il se réveille à midi.

original: It is said that the war will end soon.

original: It was kind of her to show me the way to the station.

original: I prefer to eat alone.

original: That boils down to the same thing.

original: I prefer a hotel by the airport.

original: Can you write French?

original: Beautiful minds meet.

original: I'm going to gather mushrooms in the forest this afternoon.
translated: Cet après-midi, je vais cueillir des champignons dans la forêt.

original: She was taken in by his manners.

original: Tom turned off the engine and shut off the headlights.
translated: Tom éteignit le moteur et coupa les phares.

original: I think Tom is a mechanic.

original: I know how to treat a lady.

original: He's got some very British phlegm.

original: Thanks to his experience, he had an edge over the rest.

original: I can't deal with that problem right now.

original: Tom didn't seem to know anybody at the party.

original: Wait until six in the evening.
translated: Attends jusqu'à dix-huit heures.

original: When did you get your first tattoo?

original: They suit each other.

original: Mary touched up her makeup.
translated: Marie a retouché son maquillage.

original: You're replaceable.

original: I worked alone.

original: There is no timetable.

original: This app automatically signs you in when you open it.

original: What he said made us angry.

translated: Les lettres que Tom a écrit à Mary ont été retournées non décachetées.

original: I let you catch me.

original: Would you play with me?

original: I guess it's time to go.

original: I own some very old stamps.

original: Osamu Dazai committed suicide.

original: I bought many types of cloth.

original: They're all watching us.

original: I married a Canadian.

original: I want you both to get them.

original: Don't you remember anything?

original: Why are you with a pig?

translated: Tu ferais mieux d'aller voir ton médecin de famille tout de suite.

original: Let me buy you a beer.
translated: Laissez-moi vous acheter une bière.

original: Tom dyed his hair blue.
translated: Tom s'est teint les cheveux en bleu.

original: That stinks!

original: Can you put the baby in the car seat?

original: I'm the only one planning on doing that.

original: I think love doesn't exist.

original: I've changed my website's layout.

translated: Allô. Pourrais-je parler à Mr Jackson ?

original: Mary says she understands Tom.

original: Tom would just like to know what he did wrong.

original: Have a lovely Christmas!

original: The notes are at the bottom of the page.

translated: Le climat japonais est plus doux que le climat anglais.

original: I don't hold grudges.

original: Is this big enough for you?

translated: Elle fit tout ce qu'elle put pour me nuire.

translated: Mon grand frère fait autorité en philosophie.

original: In Canada we sleep in a bed, not on the floor.
translated: Au Canada, nous dormons dans des lits, pas sur le plancher.

original: The apple fell!

original: She promised to meet him last night, but she never showed up.
translated: Elle avait promis de le rencontrer la nuit dernière, mais elle ne s'est jamais pointée.

original: The only useful answers are those that raise new questions.
translated: Les seules réponses utiles sont celles qui posent de nouvelles questions.

original: I may be plump, but I'm vigorous.

original: I was trying to be supportive.

original: That's right, they've been late twice already.

original: She started laughing.
translated: Elle s'est mise à rire.

original: I can't believe that you aren't at least willing to consider the possibility of other alternatives.

original: Happiness is a choice.

original: Who put that there?

original: You're perfect for me.

original: Could you speak a little louder please?

original: I was shocked at the sad news.

original: A good many people have told me to take a holiday.
translated: Beaucoup de gens m'ont dit de prendre des vacances.

original: I'd like to buy a Picasso.

original: You should ask Tom what happened.

original: We uploaded the pictures from our wedding to Facebook.
translated: Nous avons téléversé les photos de notre mariage sur Facebook.

original: I thought you could use this.
translated: J'ai pensé que tu pourrais utiliser ceci.

original: How long ago did the bus leave?
translated: Depuis combien de temps le bus est-il parti ?

original: I want to eat something.
translated: Je veux manger quelque chose.

original: The tree fell down.
translated: L'arbre chut.

original: She works for a large American corporation.
translated: Elle travaille pour une grande compagnie américaine.

original: Who's gonna read such a thick book?
translated: Qui voudrait lire un aussi gros livre?

original: It's hot today, isn't it?
translated: Il fait chaud, aujourd'hui, n'est-ce pas ?

original: Tom told me to shut up.

original: Doing that won't take too much of your time.

original: He's eager to speak to you.

original: I'm learning Vietnamese.

original: Tom is now three months old.
translated: Tom vient d'avoir trois mois.

original: We need to inform the president.

original: I can barely remember what my grandfather looked like.
translated: Je peux à peine me souvenir à quoi mon grand-père ressemblait.

original: It's hard to surprise her.

original: I don't know if it's what he wants.

original: Better late than never.
translated: Mieux vaut tard que jamais.

original: I will wait for you in front of the radio station.
translated: Je t'attendrai devant la station de radio.

original: Let us know what happens.

original: We spent a lot of time with them.

original: Biodiversity continues to decline each year.

original: We had to put off the meeting.
translated: Nous avons dû remettre la réunion à plus tard.

original: I can't help anyone.

translated: Nous sommes partis en voiture.

translated: Nous courûmes autour du parc.

original: Ambiguous phrases in general lead to amusing interpretations.
translated: Les phrases ambiguës donnent souvent lieu à d'amusantes interprétations.

original: She had ceased to tend her flowers and the garden had become a neglected wilderness of long stalks and leaves entangled with the branches of the tree.
translated: Elle avait cessé de s'occuper de ses fleurs et le jardin était devenu une étendue sauvage laissée à l'abandon, avec de longues tiges et des feuilles enchevêtrées dans les branches de l'arbre.

original: What did your father teach you?
translated: Qu'est-ce que votre père vous a appris ?

original: You have my permission.

original: My friend is beside me.
translated: Mon amie se trouve à mon côté.

original: Yesterday, I ran into my teacher at the amusement park.
translated: Hier j'ai rencontré par hasard mon professeur au parc d'attractions.

original: Tom had to clean his room.
translated: Tom doit nettoyer sa chambre.

original: I don't have any money on me.
translated: Je n'ai pas la moindre monnaie sur moi.

original: Tom withdrew some money from the bank.
translated: Tom a retiré de l'argent à la banque.

original: He had the last laugh.
translated: Il a ri le dernier.

original: I don't know the way.

original: I suppose it can't be helped.

original: What a bore!
translated: Quel emmerdeur !

original: Never say never.

original: Hang in there.

original: Groups are a good way to share an interest with a small community or the whole world.
translated: Les groupes sont un bon moyen de partager un centre d'intérêt en petit comité ou avec le monde entier.

original: He'll wait for you.
translated: Il vous attendra.

original: Jim slipped on the icy road and got hurt.
translated: Jim a glissé sur la route gelée et s'est fait mal.

original: This is probably a bad idea.
translated: C'est probablement une mauvaise idée.

original: Do you remember seeing me before?

original: Was that helpful?

original: I'm really enjoying the challenge.

original: What are we waiting for?

original: I've been to Paris twice.
translated: J'ai été deux fois à Paris.

original: Is Tom at home now?
translated: Est-ce que Tom est chez lui maintenant?

translated: Je me suis fait percer les oreilles.

translated: Une voiture qui passait m'a éclaboussé mon pardessus.

original: What are you doing buying a house?

original: Prices went to amazingly low levels.
translated: Les prix descendirent à des niveaux incroyablement bas.

original: Fish have stopped living in this river.
translated: Les poissons ont cessé de vivre dans cette rivière.

original: You were wise to cooperate.
translated: Tu as été sage de coopérer.

original: I'm convinced that Tom and Mary are guilty.

original: This will help keep you warm.

original: I love to party.

original: I am that.

original: I'm glad you're my friend.
translated: Je me réjouis que vous soyez mon ami.

original: He doesn't live there anymore.

original: I can't absorb all of the lesson in an hour.
translated: Je ne peux pas ingérer toute la leçon en une heure.

original: Shut your eyes.

original: You can take a break.
translated: Vous pouvez faire une pause.

original: Sami thinks his neighbors are a nightmare.
translated: Sami pense que ses voisins sont un cauchemar.

original: There are no gods.
translated: Il n'y a pas de dieux.

original: He could speak French.
translated: Il savait parler français.

original: Why don't you slow down a little bit?

original: How can I delete a repeated sentence?
translated: Comment puis-je supprimer une phrase en double ?

original: Tom knows what you've done, doesn't he?
translated: Tom sait ce que vous avez fait, n'est-ce pas ?

original: He explained the rule to me.
translated: Il m'expliqua la règle.

original: She got engaged to a rich man.
translated: Elle s'est fiancée à un riche.

original: Have you ever been tested for tuberculosis?
translated: As-tu déjà subi un test de dépistage de la tuberculose ?

original: There are no real visions.
translated: Il n'y a pas de visions réelles.

original: She didn't want to talk about it further.

original: Please send an ambulance.
translated: Appelez une ambulance s'il vous plait.

original: We were all tired.
translated: Nous étions tous fatigués.

original: That's what Tom and I are trying to do.
translated: C'est ce que Tom et moi essayons de faire.

original: You don't seem to realize how serious this is.
translated: Vous ne semblez pas réaliser à quel point ceci est sérieux.

original: My opinion is completely different from yours.
translated: Mon avis diverge complètement du tien.

original: I'm focusing on my job.

original: Could you turn off the TV?
translated: Pourrais-tu éteindre le téléviseur ?

original: They handcuffed Tom.
translated: Ils ont menotté Tom.

original: Dan will never quit.
translated: Dan n'abandonnera jamais.

original: Don't you have a girlfriend?
translated: N'as-tu pas une petite amie ?

original: He fashioned a noose out of the bed sheets and hung himself in his cell.
translated: Il a confectionné un nœud coulant avec les draps de lit et s'est pendu dans sa cellule.

original: Thanks to the Internet, the world is beginning to turn away from the centralization of resources and power that characterized the Industrial Revolution.
translated: Grâce à Internet, le monde commence à se détourner de la centralisation des ressources et du pouvoir qui a caractérisé la révolution industrielle.

original: Almost everyone believed the rumor.
translated: Presque tout le monde crut la rumeur.

original: He still depends on his parents.
translated: Il est encore dépendant de ses parents.

original: Tsunamis swept through rice fields and flooded the towns.
translated: Les tsunamis ont balayé les rizières et submergé les villes.

original: Why did you go to Tokyo?
translated: Pourquoi t'es-tu rendu à Tokyo ?

original: He knows about the modern history of France.
translated: Il a des connaissances en histoire moderne de la France.

original: Who's your French teacher?
translated: Qui est ton professeur de français ?

original: We'll have to make some tough choices.
translated: Il nous faudra faire certains choix difficiles.

original: What are the symptoms?

original: Turn down the radio.
translated: Baisse la radio.

original: Money is his God.
translated: L'argent est son Dieu.

original: That affair doesn't concern me.
translated: Cette affaire ne me concerne pas.

original: You have changed so much that I can hardly recognize you.
translated: Tu as tellement changé que j'ai du mal à te reconnaître.

original: I can talk to him for hours.
translated: Je peux lui parler durant des heures.

original: Can't you see Tom is trying to help you?
translated: Est-ce que tu ne peux pas voir que Tom essaie de t'aider ?

original: Tom worked all night.
translated: Tom a travaillé toute la nuit.

original: Look down at the floor.
translated: Regarde le sol.

original: All languages are equal, but English is more equal than the others.
translated: Toutes les langues sont égales mais l'anglaise est plus égale que les autres.

original: Time flies.
translated: Le temps passe vite.

original: You were my friend.
translated: Tu as été mon ami.

original: I went to Sweden.
translated: Je suis allé en Suède.

original: Nomadic peoples follow the water and grazing land.
translated: Les peuples nomades suivent l'eau et les pâturages.

original: Get my rifle.
translated: Attrape mon fusil !

original: I'm going to give Tom a bath.
translated: Je vais donner un bain à Tom.

original: He lost his eyesight.
translated: Il a perdu la vue.

original: Tom needed you.
translated: Tom avait besoin de toi.

original: He's here for me.
translated: Il est là pour moi.

original: How beautiful that flower is!
translated: Comme cette fleur est belle !

original: You'd better check that.
translated: Vous feriez mieux de vérifier cela.

original: He began to work to get Congress to reduce taxes.
translated: Il s'est mis à œuvrer afin que le Congrès réduise les impôts.

original: Nothing happens by chance.
translated: Rien n'arrive par hasard.

original: Tom, Mary, John and I often play cards on Monday.
translated: Tom, Mary, John et moi jouons souvent au cartes le lundi.

original: Is the hotel far from here?
translated: L'hôtel est-il loin d'ici ?

original: He likes country music.

original: You're pretty good.

original: Do you need our help?

original: Humans come from apes.

original: Don't I know you from somewhere?
translated: Est-ce que je ne vous connais pas de quelque part ?

original: If the player deliberately touches any of his pieces, he must move it, provided he can make a valid move with it. If he deliberately touches an opponent's piece, it must be captured, if capture is legally possible. This rule applies to all formal chess competitions. Players who intend to fail to observe this rule, in friendly matches, must agree on this in advance.
translated: Si le joueur touche délibérément une de ses pièces, il doit la déplacer, à condition qu'il puisse effectuer un mouvement valide avec elle. S'il touche délibérément une pièce de l'adversaire, celle-ci doit être capturée, si la capture est légalement possible. Cette règle s'applique à toutes les compétitions d'échecs formelles. Les joueurs qui ont l'intention de ne pas respecter cette règle, lors de matchs amicaux, doivent en convenir à l'avance.

original: This is your share.
translated: C'est ta part.

original: I baked cookies.

original: This bird is beautiful.

original: I like to cook all kinds of food.

original: I've been looking for them for more than one hour.

original: You cannot be serious.
translated: Vous plaisantez !

original: I would never make fun of you.
translated: Je ne me moquerais jamais de toi.

original: He's an expert at throwing knives.
translated: C'est un expert du lancer de couteaux.

original: He's a late bloomer.
translated: Il est tardivement arrivé à maturité.

original: I lent my pencil to Tom.
translated: J'ai prêté mon crayon à Tom.

original: Please record this.
translated: Veuillez l'enregistrer.

original: He thinks that he can prove it.
translated: Il pense qu'il peut le prouver.

original: I'll quit.
translated: J'abandonnerai.

original: I didn't know you had a cat.
translated: Je ne savais pas que tu avais un chat.

original: Where else should we go?
translated: Où d'autre devrions-nous nous rendre ?

original: The train had already left when we got to station.
translated: Le train était déjà parti lorsque nous sommes arrivés à la gare.

original: It was a group effort.
translated: C'était un effort de groupe.

original: May I take a picture of you?
translated: Puis-je prendre une photo de toi ?

original: Mary doesn't like her profession for a number of reasons.
translated: Mary n'aime pas son boulot pour certaines raisons.

original: It's your turn to sing.
translated: C'est à toi de chanter.

original: I didn't know that you weren't Canadian.
translated: J'ignorais que vous n'étiez pas canadienne.

original: I should have said yes.
translated: J'aurais dû dire oui.

original: They liked having more space for their children to play.
translated: Elles apprécièrent de disposer de davantage d'espace pour que leurs enfants jouent.

original: We played golf last Monday.
translated: Nous avons joué au golf lundi dernier.

original: "Do you have kids?" "Yes, I have a son."
translated: « As-tu des enfants ? » « Oui, j'ai un fils. »

original: Why not just say no to him?
translated: Pourquoi ne pas simplement lui dire non ?

original: I met the president himself.
translated: J'ai rencontré le président lui-même.

original: She gave me his phone number.
translated: Elle m'a donné son numéro de téléphone.

original: The water is warm.
translated: L'eau est chaude.

original: Stop interfering.
translated: Arrêtez d'interférer.

original: Stop slagging off my brilliant idea, it's not naive at all!
translated: Arrête de démolir mon idée géniale, elle n'est pas si fragile.

original: Why are you so insolent?
translated: Pourquoi es-tu si insolent ?

original: Let's get out while we can.
translated: Sortons tant que nous le pouvons.

original: I like her dark eyes.
translated: J'aime ses yeux foncés.

original: It's getting dark. Let's set up the camp.
translated: La nuit tombe, préparons le camp.

original: If you need a ride, I could come and get you.
translated: Si tu as besoin de te faire conduire, je pourrais venir te chercher.

original: I have not seen him lately.
translated: Je ne l'ai pas vu ces derniers temps.

original: She's a clever girl.
translated: C'est une fille intelligente.

original: You talk really fast.
translated: Tu parles vraiment vite.

original: Do you love this song?
translated: Est-ce que tu aimes cette chanson?

original: Here, snow falls in large flakes.
translated: Ici, la neige tombe en gros flocons.

original: Before I forget, I will tell you.
translated: Avant d'oublier, je vais te le dire.

original: Greek is not an easy language.
translated: Le grec n'est pas une langue facile.

original: This couch is not comfortable.
translated: Ce canapé n'est pas confortable.

original: I should have studied more.
translated: J'aurais dû étudier davantage.

original: I don't usually burn incense at home.
translated: Je ne brûle pas d'encens à la maison, habituellement.

original: I didn't tell you anything.
translated: Je ne t'ai rien dit.

original: He retired on account of poor health.
translated: Il a pris sa retraite à cause d'une mauvaise santé.

original: I'm living in a small town.
translated: Je vis dans une petite commune.

original: Tom gave us lots to eat.
translated: Tom nous a beaucoup donné à manger.

original: I'm dying.
translated: Je meurs.

original: You are both pretty and kind.
translated: Tu es à la fois mignonne et gentille.

original: From six until eight in the evening is happy hour.
translated: Le soir de six à huit heures, c'est happy hour.

original: He was right the first time.
translated: Il avait raison la première fois.

original: We can't do everything.
translated: Nous ne pouvons pas tout faire.
